properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 9 at 3:48AM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas around 11 feet at 10 seconds or less. For the Small Craft
Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas around 11 feet at 12 seconds. For the Hazardous Seas Watch,
very steep and hazardous seas 21 to 26 feet at 16 seconds
possible.

* WHERE...This morning's Hazardous Seas Warning is for much of the
area beyond 10 NM of the coast south of Gold Beach. The Small
Craft Advisory is in effect for the remainder of the area this
morning. The Hazardous Seas Watch remains in effect for the
entire area.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning and the Small Craft Advisory,
until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Hazardous Seas Watch,
from Friday evening through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...In the advisory area small boats and inexperienced
mariners could encounter conditions that could jeopardize
safety. In the warning and during the watch period, strong
winds and very steep seas could damage or displace fishing gear.
Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or damage vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that winds and seas will create a
potential hazard to smaller vessels and inexperienced mariners.

A Hazardous Seas Warning means very steep and hazardous sea
conditions are imminent or occurring. Recreational boaters should
remain in port, or take shelter until waves subside.  Commercial
vessels should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in
port or taking shelter in port until hazardous seas subside.

A Hazardous Seas Watch is issued when the risk of very steep and
hazardous seas has significantly increased, but the specific
timing and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to
provide additional lead time for mariners who may wish to
consider altering their plans.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
